text: On skryvayetsya ot lyudey, chtoby oni ne zametili ogorcheniya, okhvativshego yego, kogda on uslyshal o rozhdenii docheri, i v rasteryannosti on razmyshlyayet: "Ostavit' yeyo v zhivykh i terpet' unizheniye i sram, kak on predstavlyayet, ili zakopat' yeyo zhivuyu v zemlyu, chtoby ona pogibla?" Obrati vnimaniye, o slushatel', kak skverno deyaniye i rassuzhdeniye tekh, kto pripisyvayet Allakhu togo, kogo ne zhelayet sebe
